com.ibm.team.build.ant.task

Class AbstractFilePublisherTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • Task
      • com.ibm.team.build.ant.task.AbstractTeamBuildTask
        • com.ibm.team.build.ant.task.AbstractPublisherTask
          • com.ibm.team.build.ant.task.AbstractFilePublisherTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStaticReset
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    com.ibm.team.build.internal.ant.AbstractContentPublisherTask, JdtCompileLogPublisherTask, JUnitLogPublisherTask, UnitLogPublisherTask, WorkItemPublisherTask

    public abstract class AbstractFilePublisherTask
extends AbstractPublisherTask
    Base ant task for publishing a file to an existing build result, using a file (or directory) path as input. Ant tasks that need this behavior should subclass this class. This class does not process the file or directory but it does enforce that it exists. Subclasses must process the file or directory and update the build result as appropriate.

    Required attributes are:

    • filePath - A path relative to the base directory of the build file or the full path to the input file or directory.
    See AbstractPublisherTask for additional required and optional attributes.
    Since:
    0.5

      • collectAntAttributes

        protected void collectAntAttributes(java.util.List antAttributes)
        Description copied from class: AbstractTeamBuildTask
        Abstract method that collects the attributes associated with the Ant task. All attributes are collected into the same list. Derived classes should override and add their ant attributes to the list. The list should contain attributes of type AntAttribute.
        Overrides:
        collectAntAttributes in class AbstractPublisherTask
